snippet.title: DVD Review: Johnny Tremain
snippet.description: Decent complement to the classic children's novel.

snippet.title: TV Review: Johnny and the Sprites
snippet.description: Singing, dancing, and great messages for kids.

snippet.title: Music Review: Johnny and the Sprites
snippet.description: Fun, Broadway-style music with good messages.

snippet.title: Little Mermaid Cake
snippet.description: If you're throwing a party inspired by Princess Ariel, no doubt you'll want to make a big splash. Complete with a candy-topped tail, red frosting tresses, and a pretty pearl necklace, this Little Mermaid Cake has you co...

snippet.title: Disney Printable: Little Einsteins Characters
snippet.description: Now your preschooler can go on an adventure with Little Einsteins' June, Leo, Annie, and Quincy.

snippet.title: Little Mermaid Costume
snippet.description: Be the Little Mermaid for Halloween with this fun homemade Disney costume idea!

snippet.title: Little Mermaid II Costume
snippet.description: Be the Little Mermaid for Halloween with this fun homemade Disney costume idea!

snippet.title: Getting Back Out There: Seven Dating Rules for the Single Mom
snippet.description: As a dating expert, I find my inbox gets flooded every single day with emails from women who say, 'Your advice is great, but I've got kids. Will it work for me?' The answer is YES!

snippet.title: Movie Review:The Little Mermaid: Ariel's Beginning
snippet.description: Ariel devotees -- not to mention new fans -- will want to dive in to this origin tale again and again. (And possibly memorize the antics of the most charming manatee in Atlantica.)

snippet.title: Movie Review:Darby O'Gill and the Little People
snippet.description: Released in Dublin in 1959, Darby O'Gill takes you back to the old magic of Disney movies.
